__e: Under our new government, we no longer have political prisoners.
Why don't you have this fellow placed in a cell for a little while with other political prisoners?
We have gone from 3,000 prisoners under the Shah to 300,000 with you.
You don't keep the picture up for political reasons.
You led me to believe that you wanted him dead for political reasons, when it was in fact to protect yourself.
How can a man of Dr. Kirby's stature be dismissed for political reasons?
The Vice Regent doesn't share his political or military ruminations with the woman who tried to kill his mother.
It is in danger, at this moment, from men... and doctrines that are the enemies of all freedoms... political, as well as religious.
She did everything she could to make me a political and permissive person.
Yes, they were childhood friends, you see, and our families shared friendship until her father's patriot politics drove us to disagreement.
This has nothing to do with our political differences.
If you mean my politics, you know we've agreed to put that on one side until the war is won.
